+def kiemtra(a,b,c):
+    return (int(a)+int(b)+int(c))/3
+a=int(input())
+if 0 <= a <=10:
+    b=int(input())
+    if 0<=b<=10:
+        c=int(input())
+        if 0<=c<=10:
+            kiemtra(a,b,c)
+        else: print('khong hop le')
+    else: print('Khong hop le !')
+else: print('Khong hop le !')

@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+def kiemtra(a,b,c):
+    return (a+b+c)/3
+def nhap():
+    while True:
+        a=float(input())
+        if 0<=a <=10:
+            while True:
+                b=float(input())
+                if 0<=b <=10:
+                    while True:
+                        c=float(input())
+                        if 0<=c <=10:
+                            return a,b,c
+                        else: print('khong hop le')
+                else:
+                    print('khong hop le!')
+        else:
+            print('khong hop le !')
+a,b,c=nhap()
+print(kiemtra(a,b,c))
\ No newline at end of file
